name: PixilMontage1
description:
Pixil Montage 1: The Battle of Pixalya is a celebration of the unrivaled talent of the contributors at pixilart.com. It is a collaborative effort by multiple artists with varied backgrounds and experience with the sole purpose of championing what we feel to be the most important aspect of playing and creating video games: to have fun!

Credits: Amsterdam15.

Sprites, Tile Sets.  https://www.pixilart.com/amsterdam15
